title: Dark Souls 2: Scholar of the First Sin
notes: Works fine in WINE Staging (with pba patches and without it).
specs: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 / GTX 550 Ti

title: Dark Souls II Scholar of the First Sin
notes: No intro movies or sound only text, after that game runs fine, some stuttering.

title: DARK SOULS™ II: Scholar of the First Sin
notes: Runs at a smooth 60fps, mouse look appears to not work but it works fine in the menus, so use a controller if you have one.

title: DARK SOULS™ II: Scholar of the First Sin
notes: Window seems to open for a moment, but application crashes entirely afterwards

title: DARK SOULS™ II: Scholar of the First Sin
notes:
Error: intro cinematic ("Perhaps you've seen it, maybe in a dream") has no sound/music and no graphics, but the game does show subtitles for the intro cinematic...
You can skip the intro cinematic, and continue with the rest of the game.

Performance: slight FPS drops from time to time, but on the whole still performs well.

Controller function: Xbox360 controller works just fine, just as expected, no input-lag, it seems to me.

It seems to connect online just fine, I saw messages from other players on the ground. Didn't check summoning friends/enemies yet.

In-game engine sound and music all seems to work fine.

title: DARK SOULS™ II: Scholar of the First Sin
notes: Getting 50-60FPS at 1440p. Running it at 3440x1440 but the game is only rendering 2560x1440 with black bars at the sides.

title: DARK SOULS™ II: Scholar of the First Sin
notes: Frame drops

title: DARK SOULS™ II: Scholar of the First Sin
notes: Flawless 60 fps. Really impressive, feels like a native game.

title: DARK SOULS™ II: Scholar of the First Sin
notes: Menue works, after game start intro has no video or audio, subtitles work. XBox 360 controller works. After intro the loading screens appears and the game crashed.

title: DARK SOULS™ II: Scholar of the First Sin
notes: Works only with "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%" launch command.  Works with both 3.7-3 and 3.7-4 beta.

title: DARK SOULS™ II: Scholar of the First Sin
notes: movies are broken

title: DARK SOULS™ II: Scholar of the First Sin
notes: Much LESS FPS in Proton then in WINE Staging. 20 in Proton vs 40-60 in WINE Staging (with PBA patches). Even if I set everything on low, fps doesn't change. In Staging I can play on height-medium settings.
specs: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 / GTX 550 Ti

title: DARK SOULS™ II: Scholar of the First Sin
notes: Opening movie doesn't play, but everything else is perfect.

No intro cinematic. Also the only way to quit the game is to quit through menu. Process can't be killed and Alt-F4 doesn't function. Also it is impossible to switch to desktop while the game is launched

title: DARK SOULS™ II: Scholar of the First Sin

notes: Great performance. After 3-4 hours of playing (based on changing areas?) some sound effects start to disappear. Boss music and voice lines start to fail to play. Restart the game as soon as you notice it to avoid crashing.
